sense.gloss: to mend, to patch up, to repair, to fix, to darn
to fix (hair, clothes, appearance, etc.), to adjust, to tidy up, to groom
to keep up appearances, to cover up (e.g. a mistake), to gloss over

sdata.j: ↑世間体↑↓せけんてい↓を|↑繕↑↓つくろ↓う|↑心配↑↓しんぱい↓をするより↑他↑↓た↓にやることがある。
sdata.e: We have other things to do than worry about keeping up appearances.

sdata.j: ↑取↑↓と↓り|↑繕↑↓つくろ↓う|ように、↑笑↑↓わら↓ってみせる。
sdata.e: She smiled to smooth things over.
